refsect2.para: Sets the title for the font selection dialog. If title is NULL, then the default is used.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME font picker widget.
String containing font selection dialog title.

refsect2.title: gnome_font_picker_get_mode ()

warning.para: gnome_font_picker_get_mode is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Returns current font picker button mode (or what to show). Possible values include GNOME_FONT_PICKER_MODE_PIXMAP, GNOME_FONT_PICKER_MODE_FONT_INFO, and GNOME_FONT_PICKER_MODE_USER_WIDGET.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME font picker widget.
Button mode currently set in font picker widget, or GNOME_FONT_PICKER_MODE_UNKNOWN on error.

refsect2.title: gnome_font_picker_set_mode ()

warning.para: gnome_font_picker_set_mode is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Set value of subsequent font picker button mode (or what to show).

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME font picker widget.
Value of subsequent font picker button mode (or what to show)

refsect2.title: gnome_font_picker_fi_set_use_font_in_label ()

warning.para: gnome_font_picker_fi_set_use_font_in_label is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: If use_font_in_label is TRUE, font name will be written using font chosen by user and using size passed to this function. This only applies if current button mode is GNOME_FONT_PICKER_MODE_FONT_INFO.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME font picker widget.
If TRUE, font name will be written using font chosen.
Display font using this point size.

refsect2.title: gnome_font_picker_fi_set_show_size ()

warning.para: gnome_font_picker_fi_set_show_size is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: If show_size is TRUE, font size will be displayed along with font chosen by user. This only applies if current button mode is GNOME_FONT_PICKER_MODE_FONT_INFO.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME font picker widget.
TRUE if font size should be displayed in dialog.

refsect2.title: gnome_font_picker_uw_set_widget ()

warning.para: gnome_font_picker_uw_set_widget is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Set the user-supplied widget as the inside of the font picker. This only applies with GNOME_FONT_PICKER_MODE_USER_WIDGET.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME font picker widget.
User widget to display for inside of font picker.

refsect2.title: gnome_font_picker_uw_get_widget ()

warning.para: gnome_font_picker_uw_get_widget is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Get the user-supplied widget inside of the font picker. This only applies with GNOME_FONT_PICKER_MODE_USER_WIDGET.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME font picker widget.
a GtkWidget, or NULL if not in GNOME_FONT_PICKER_MODE_USER_WIDGET mode

refsect2.para: Retrieve name of font from font selection dialog.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME font picker widget.
Pointer to an internal copy of the font name.

refsect2.title: gnome_font_picker_get_font ()

warning.para: gnome_font_picker_get_font is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Retrieve font info from font selection dialog.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME font picker widget.
Return value of gtk_font_selection_dialog_get_font, or NULL if font dialog is not being displayed. The value is not a copy but an internal value and should not be modified.

refsect2.title: gnome_font_picker_set_font_name ()

warning.para: gnome_font_picker_set_font_name is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Set or update currently-displayed font in font picker dialog.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME font picker widget.
Name of font to display in font selection dialog
Return value of gtk_font_selection_dialog_set_font_name if the font selection dialog exists, otherwise FALSE.

refsect2.title: gnome_font_picker_get_preview_text ()

warning.para: gnome_font_picker_get_preview_text is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Retrieve preview text from font selection dialog if available.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME font picker widget.
Reference to internal copy of preview text string, or NULL if no font dialog is being displayed.

refsect2.title: gnome_font_picker_set_preview_text ()

warning.para: gnome_font_picker_set_preview_text is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Set preview text in font picker, and in font selection dialog if one is being displayed.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME font picker widget.
New preview text

refsect2.title: The "font" property
refsect2.para: The selected GtkFont.

refsect2.title: The "font-name" property
refsect2.para: Name of the selected font.
Default value: "sans 12"

refsect2.title: The "label-font-size" property
refsect2.para: Font size for label in font info mode.
Allowed values: [8,72]
Default value: 14

refsect2.title: The "mode" property
refsect2.para: The mode of operation of the font picker.
Default value: GNOME_FONT_PICKER_MODE_PIXMAP

refsect2.title: The "preview-text" property
refsect2.para: Preview text shown in the dialog.
Default value: "AaBbCcDdEeFfGgHhIiJjKkLlMmNnOoPpQqRrSsTtUuVvWwXxYyZz"

refsect2.title: The "show-size" property
refsect2.para: Show size in font info mode.
Default value: TRUE

refsect2.title: The "title" property
refsect2.para: The title of the selection dialog box.
Default value: "Pick a Font"

refsect2.title: The "use-font-in-label" property
refsect2.para: Use font in the label in font info mode.
Default value: FALSE

user data set when the signal handler was connected.
